group_1.textCenter: It doesn't seem like you would ever change,@even after hundreds of years.

group_1.narration: | I believe Ryo is correct. Because we exist to@tell a certain story. |

group_1.textRight: Hey, Yachiyo, take the bones out of this fish.

group_1.textLeft: I went out of my way to prepare fish today so@that you could practice removing them.
That's right, Touka, yellowtails aren't so hard to@debone.

group_1.textRight: What? This is just bullying!
Nemu would never be able to do this, she@was always in the hospital with me.

group_1.textLeft: I've already learned to do it. Look, these are@the fish bones.

group_1.textRight: [chara:100701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Nyaaah?!

group_1.textLeft: Ahahaha! You're the only one who can't!
Studyin' stuff like this is important too!

group_1.textRight: It's the same for you, Felicia! You have to aim@for a higher level!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
No one's gonna care how well someone can@remove a fish bone!

group_1.textRight: Oh, a complete heel-turn!!

group_1.textLeft: | Touka, would you like me to do it? |

group_1.textRight: Nope, my amygdala was stimulated and now@adrenaline is being produced.
It's frustrating to fall behind Nemu.
I'll definitely do a better job than her at@removing the bones!

group_1.textLeft: | What about you, Ui? |

group_1.textRight: Iroha and Sana taught me how, so I'll try my@best!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, good luck...! I think you're getting@good at it...

group_1.textRight: Plus, my teacher at school told me...
If you can get the bones out of the fish cleanly,@you're able to eat cleanly.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, really?

group_1.textRight: I agree with your teacher.

group_1.textLeft: | Which teacher, your homeroom teacher? |

group_1.textRight: Yup, she's really nice.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, you're right.
When she heard that you just got out of the@hospital, she was very accommodating.

group_1.textRight: Also, she made time for us to play so that I@could get along with others quickly.
When some kids made fun of me for being@in the hospital for so long...
I couldn't explain it to them, but she did it@for me.
That's why I really like my teacher.
And when she talks, she talks like "so-and-so,@you know?"
I can tell right away when the teacher is talking@because of the "you know" at the end!

group_1.textLeft: That's very distinctive, isn't it?
| Are teachers important? |

group_1.textRight: Yup, if it wasn't for my teacher, I wouldn't have@been able to fit in so well.

group_1.textLeft: | So for me, Senior-senpai is like a teacher? |
(I can't do anything with what they've taught@me, though...)

group_1.textRight: Senior-senpai?

group_1.textLeft: | The sakura tree in Sankyo Ward. |

group_1.textRight: Speaking of which, was there anything that@you were able to learn throughout this time?
Or at least whether it's suitable for a cherry@blossom viewing.
That's what you went to determine, right?

group_1.textLeft: | Yes, I've come to a conclusion. |
| I believe that sakura tree is worthy of hosting@a cherry blossom viewing. |

group_1.textRight: Oh, I guess that's settled![chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100301:cheek_0][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json:motion_101][chara:100301:lipSynch_1] I'll have to figure out@what to cook for everyone from Banbanzai!
Each of us should bring our own food, but@let's also make arrangements with Manaka.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I'm sure that'll make everyone happy with@at least one of the dishes.

group_1.textRight: Manaka's cooking...! Definitely...please ask@her...!
I'm sure that Tsumugi and Ria will also be@very happy...!
